title: Girlfriend of 20 Years Takes a Stand

lines.linesSec1: DEAR ABBY: I have been with this man for more than 20 years and we still haven't tied the knot. When I told him that because I'm not his wife, I'm not willing to do wifely duties anymore, he got really upset. Do you think I should give him an ultimatum? -- ON HOLD IN CALIFORNIA.
lines.linesSec2: DEAR ON HOLD: I think you already have!
